Ford Motor is carving a unique lane as the automaker goes after the electric vehicle market, newly installed CEO Jim Farley told CNBC's Jim Cramer Thursday.

articles.title: Alibaba’s Singles Day Sales Growth Keeps Pace - Barron's
articles.content:
Alibabas big Singles Day shopping event hauled in more than $74 billion for the e-commerce giant this year, 26% more than last year and keeping pace with sales growth in previous years.

articles.author: Ian Bezek
articles.title: With Pfizer Winning the Vaccine Race, Novavax Is a Strong Sell - InvestorPlace
articles.description: Novavax made a valiant effort at developing the leading Covid-19 vaccine, but it fell short. Now poor earnings will sink NVAX stock.
